column2: "Fu- Hello there, a really sweet Patty here. This planet is always hot!"
"Sometimes, I think there's something off about the way I greet people."
"Tea here. Sorry for my stupid ill-mannered sister bothering you all of the time."
"Hm, stupid and ill-mannered, two bad statements makes it a plus, right?"
"Also Patty, this area is under alert, so we should act more serious."
"Oh, right. This area was put under alert recently, they should have sent everyone a message."
"What? You haven't been contacted? Well, that's... really? That seems odd."
"The message should have been sent to everyone. I don't know why someone wouldn't be notified."
"Or maybe left it out on purpose!"
"That might be taking it a little far, it's a kind of miss that could have happened to anyone."
"It's a good thing that we met up here then. Take care of yourself."
